title: What is the best Indian dating app to try while I am spending time at home during the pandemic? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have one experience about dating site before..when i meet 1 house wife in dating site. We chat and finally we meet n enjoy a lot. But this time in lockdown i meet another lady who meet me in locanto. She is also housewife with so good of sense of humour. But when i msg her first time. She ignored me. But thank god she replied me once. And we chat since 2nd lockdown. She is housewife and belongs to very well setteled family. And she doing paid cam show with me. Her body stucture is amazing and after 4–5 video call service i simply ask for real meet. That time She said we can meet after lockdown is over. Now i m waiting for real meet with so beutiful body n want to fun with her. Her name is namu and u can contect her with msg. But my free advice is that…Be careful. If she ignored once dont penic n be genuine.her number is nine four two seven seven nine nine zero two zero. Thats my experience about lockdown.
